mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (password, github_username, empno) VALUES (#{password}, #{githubUsername}, #{empno})
mapper.select: SELECT users.id AS id, users.github_username, users.password, users.empno, emp.ename, emp.ephone, emp.email, emp.phone, emp.estate, emp.deptno, emp.jobno FROM users LEFT JOIN emp ON users.empno = emp.empno ORDER BY users.id
